list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the outside part or uppermost layer of something (often used when describing its texture, form, or extent).
a continuous set of points that has length and breadth but no thickness.
relating to or occurring on the upper or outer part of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: surface workers at the copper mines
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công nhân bề mặt tại các mỏ đồng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: rise or come up to the surface of the water or the ground.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta nổi lên từ lặn của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: provide (something, especially a road) with a particular upper or outer layer.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a small path surfaced with terra-cotta tiles
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một con đường nhỏ nổi lên với gạch terra-cotta
